channel.title: Black/Market?
channel.description:
I was thinking we need a black/market forum. It should be like Sythes but it should have a minium post count thing like Fagex. The post count should be [b]high[/b] and I mean high. Like 500+ posts for the accounts, 400+ for the Gp trade and membership, and like 200+ for everything else.
It woud make us more of a cheating community, seeing how all Rs cheating community have a market.
Now I have thought this through, and figured this would acttract spammers/flamers and scammers, but we can again make the post count high (Like I said above), we can put a restriction that you need to be over 1 month old and everything else that you guys can think of. I don't know if this has been suggested before, but it be awesome. Thanks, IrFaN786
-- Glossary: Black/Market-A market where you can trade items in real life or items in RS or even accounts and membership pins for items in real life or items in RS or even real life cash and RS gp.
A Black/Market usually has 2 whole boards donated to it, and in those boards about 5 child boards in each. Eg; In the Black Market board they're will be child boards like; Membership Sales, Account Sales, GP Sales etc. In the Market board they're will be child boards like; RS Item Sales (Sorry couldn't think of more buy got the idea). --
Please vote and state your oppinion.

item.title: Black/Market?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

moparisthebest:

I don’t care if 99.99999% of this forum wants a black market here, there will never be one. All a black market is is a huge scammer magnet, postcount means nothing. I will keep this thread open for awhile for you guys to discuss this, but just keep in mind my first sentance.

That’s exactly the reson why I don’t want one.

Read full topic

item.title: Black/Market?
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]I was thinking we need a black/market forum.

On their own, you know those ideas are good. We could have a forum for talking about black people and a forum for selling fruit.[/quote]

Lol, I can already predict where all of your posts would be.

On Topic:

The ONLY way a BlackMarket would work is if you had to apply for membership (like SRL). Yet everyone could just be nice until they get in then scam. Also, if you made it a rank requirement, say Community Member, then the rank would mean NOTHING anymore; every single new person here would be racing to CM status JUST to get into the BlackMarket.

All-In-All, bad idea. = \

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Im saying no to this idea. Black Market forums would turn users against other users. It would give users to scam each others. It would create a great chaos to the whole community. Just think about when 5 day old user gets scammed. He will post whole forums full of his complain topics.

Agreed.

The real black market isn’t on the internet.
Just go to your local library untill you see kids playing Runescape, then threaten their families and stab them a few times, prefferably somewhere squishy and painful (inner thigh, use a pumpkin carver) and get their password.

Read full topic

item.title: Black/Market?
item.dc:creator: @Algas Algas
item.description:
@Algas wrote:

What does black market have to do for runescape cheating?

All other runescape cheating communitys have a black market forum. But i must say that Black markets are only turning against those forums. For example sythe.org. People gets banned for scamming all the time. I was an official MM there for a while back and it really sucks when people starts to make almost identical msn addresses.

Then to that post count suggestion. Post count means absolutely nothing on these forums. Only spammers respects post count (thats why I set spammers post count to 0). What should really matter is how you contribute to the community. Its not reputation points or post count that defines great member of our community. Other users do.

Im saying no to this idea. Black Market forums would turn users against other users. It would give users to scam each others. It would create a great chaos to the whole community. Just think about when 5 day old user gets scammed. He will post whole forums full of his complain topics.

If you wanna merchant use sythe.org.

Read full topic
